name: Tower Defense The Red Bug
description:
how to play :  Tips: left click or double click to drag "Tank" and  press "K" to place  on        the boxes  

  Tips: drag "Tank" to any placed "Tank" and press "K"  to delete it                                                   press "K"  again to place

 Tips:  You win when  the count down is over.

Bonus:   Tips: kill !!! your first 100 enemy  and get $50

                                                        Thanks for playing

You can join my tutorial on making a simple  tower defense game on gdevelop, check out my youtube channel to join the tutorial : 

support me by subscribing to my Youtube channel please: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuxYS741Sp_d4-Apx9ojX2g
